attributes.action: stop abortion in Britain and to stop the extension of the Abortion Act in Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
4000 babies are aborted in Britain every week.  Petition to stop abortion and provide women with alternative choices, financial and emotional support.  

We live in a throw-away society; save lives and acknowledge the sanctity of life. 

The unborn child has a right to life and should be protected. 

Please research the reality of the procedures.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
